uikit.connect_wallet_subtitle: Connect with one of our available wallet providers.
uikit.fennec_introduction: Fennec is a Mixin network browser wallet, you need to install Fennec before the connection.
uikit.lasting_tip: Possible transfer congestion currently. Your funds are safe, please be patient.
uikit.links_connect_detail: Open {0} on your mobile phone and scan the QR code, then confirm authorization to connect your wallet.
uikit.mixin_connect_detail: Open {0} on your mobile phone and scan the QR code, then confirm authorization to connect your wallet.
uikit.mixin_pay_detail: Open {0} on your mobile phone and scan the QR code, then confirm the payment.
uikit.metamask_introduction: Using MVM requires pre-installation of Metamask compatible wallets, please make sure you have the wallet application ready.
uikit.gas_fee_hint: If you use Metamask and Other wallet, you can claim some tokens as gas fee. Get for free
uikit.metamask_not_installed_2: Please open in the built-in browser of metamask mobile app or desktop browser.
uikit.metamask_introduction_2:
You have two ways to connect to Metamask.
1: Copy the dApp address and open it in Metamask's built-in browser.
2: Open it in a desktop browser.
